update MemorandumAttachment
Register_Id = #{registerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ZSIsExamine = #{zsisexamine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZSExamineTime = #{zsexaminetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ZSExamineName = #{zsexaminename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZSRevokeTime = #{zsrevoketime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ZSRevokeName = #{zsrevokename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

JWRevokeTime = #{jwrevoketime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
JWRevokeName = #{jwrevokename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where MemorandumAttachment_Id = #{memorandumattachmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update MemorandumAttachment set Register_Id = #{registerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ZSIsExamine = #{zsisexamine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZSExamineTime = #{zsexaminetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZSExamineName = #{zsexaminename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZSRevokeTime = #{zsrevoketime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZSRevokeName = #{zsrevokename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JWIsExamine = #{jwisexamine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JWExamineTime = #{jwexaminetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JWExamineName = #{jwexaminename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JWRevokeTime = #{jwrevoketime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JWRevokeName = #{jwrevokename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MemorandumAttachment_Id = #{memorandumattachmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
